Html:
Hi,

I got some problems with GMap.Net and need some help :)
1) Drawn paths disappear when the zoom of GMapCotrol is greater than 15-16 - how to solve this?
2) I drawi multiple paths on a one route (off the map) and the paths are overlapping on each other. Only one route is visible with the highest Z-index property. I want to draw them one beside the other.

Please help my :)
Does anyone know the answer and can help my?
